about_the_game:
A dark fog has invaded the peaceful Frog Kingdom, corrupting its inhabitants and turning them into wild, hostile creatures. As one of the last guardians of the frog order, it is up to you to fight this mysterious force and restore balance.

  • Tame your rivals: Defeat corrupted frogs in strategic battles and win them for your team. Each new member brings unique skills and characteristics that will have a decisive influence on the course of your adventure.

  • Build your team: Strengthen and develop your frogs to form the strongest squad in the kingdom. Experiment with different combinations and discover synergies between the abilities of your companions.

  • Autobattler strategy: Deploy your troops skilfully in intense battles, use their strengths and adapt your strategy to the enemy formations. Let the frogs fight for themselves as you rethink and adapt the course of the game.

  • Discover a corrupted world: Travel through mystical swamplands or enchanted forests. Uncover the secrets behind the corruption that has plagued the kingdom.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: 2 GHz dual-core processor
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU with at least 256 MB VRAM, compatible with OpenGL 3.0 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

short_description: Assemble a team of frogs by taming corrupted frogs from battles and utilising their powers. Fight strategically in an Autobattler to save the kingdom from mysterious, hostile forces.
